headlines.description: Arsenal claimed an emphatic 3-1 victory over North London rivals Tottenham Hotspur at the Emirates on Saturday to remain top of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal roar past rivals Spurs to stay top

headlines.description: Bournemouth and Brentford played out a goalless draw in their first top-flight meeting at the Vitality Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth held by Brentford in stalemate

headlines.description: Chelsea claimed a late 2-1 victory over Crystal Palace on Saturday to give manager Graham Potter his first win in charge.
headlines.shortLinkText: Potter earns late win in Prem debut as Chelsea boss

headlines.description: — Miguel Almiron struck twice as Newcastle cruised to a comfortable 4-1 victory at 10-man Fulham in the English Premier League on Saturday.

— Leandro Trossard completed his hat trick with an 83rd-minute equalizer to earn Brighton a 3-3 draw at Liverpool in the Premier League on Saturday, marking an entertaining start to Roberto De Zerbi’s time in charge of the team from England’s south...
headlines.shortLinkText: Trossard hat trick helps Brighton draw at Liverpool 3-3

headlines.description: Conor Coady and Dwight McNeil scored in quick succession in the second half as Everton came from behind to overcome Southampton 2-1 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Quickfire double gives Everton 2-1 win at Southampton

events.name: Wolverhampton Wanderers at West Ham United

headlines.description: West Ham United moved out of the Premier League relegation zone with a 2-0 win over Wolves on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Scamacca strikes as West Ham ease past Wolves
